title: Classic Riven uses Dawnbringer Riven SFX on W
body:
When playing Classic Riven and having a Dawnbringer Riven on the other team, Classic Riven will have Dawnbringer Riven's SFX on her W.

Best shown in the clip provided.

replies.body:
Hey! 

First off, that's a wicked sweet name! :D 

Thanks for the bug report! I'll poke into this today - it's a clear case of audio theft, but something that we can definitely fix up.
